Hello Nursery_E, thank you again for your previous replies. Thank you for your time and guidance.

conversation.message:

The most helpful information to keep on file would be: (1) your preferred start date and flexibility window, and (2) the schedule you need (days/hours), plus any non-negotiable constraints. I also encourage you to continue pursuing other options in parallel; if we become able to make an offer, we will reach out promptly.

conversation.message:
Hello Nursery_E, thank you for the guidance. Sharing the details you requested so you have them on file:

1) Preferred start date & flexibility: Our preferred start is as soon as possible. We can start immediately if needed, and we are also flexible within the next 4–8 weeks if that better fits your timing.

2) Schedule needed & constraints: We are seeking a standard full-week placement (Mon–Fri). We can be flexible on exact drop-off/pick-up times within typical nursery hours; we do not have any non-negotiable constraints beyond needing weekday coverage.

Nursery_E remains our first choice, and if an offer becomes available we are ready to confirm acceptance immediately. If there is any specific timing you expect for a decision (even approximate), I’d be grateful to know.

Thank you again.
